briefTitle: Prevalence of Paclitaxel Induced CIPN-Related Pain and CIPN in Indian Patients With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Prevalence of Paclitaxel Induced CIPN-Related Pain and CIPN in Indian Patients With Breast Cancer : A Prospective Observational Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Prevalence of Paclitaxel induced CIPN-related pain
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Histopathologically confirmed Primary breast cancer
2. Patients who had received adjuvant chemotherapy with Paclitaxel and who have completed their Paclitaxel chemotherapy within the preceding 2 years i.e. between 1stAugust 2014 to 31st July 2016.

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Age below 18 years
2. On current Paclitaxel chemotherapy
3. Patients with radiological evidence of bone metastases.
